name: Tigers of the Pacific Lite
description:
Take flight on a death defying journey across the Pacific and join the dogfight against a gang of ruthless fighter pilots. Tigers of the Pacific features quick action gameplay combined with awe inspiring 3D graphics and awesome audio and effects. The free Lite version offers a small taste of the exciting full game!

Please purchase the full version to support updates and future projects!

Lite Game Features:
* 6 missions across different sky scapes
* Multiple upgrades and special power ups
* 3 challenging end level boss fights
* 2 difficulty levels to conquer
* Shoot 'em up action gameplay in a stunning 3D environment
* Tilt controls and analog controls

Full Game Features:
* 20 missions across different sky scapes
* Multiple upgrades and special power ups
* 5 challenging end level boss fights
* 4 difficulty levels to conquer
* Shoot 'em up action gameplay in a stunning 3D environment
* Tilt controls and analog controls
